Description: an ID is repeated more than once inside a single cell
the same bibliographic entity is found in both citing_id and cited_id of the same row
the same citation (= the fact that a bibliographic entity cites another bibliograhic entity) is found in more than one row
inside the id field, spaces are found at the beginning of the string or at the end, or extra spaces are found between two single ids
the single id (item) is not well-formed according to OC syntax (lowercase accepted prefix followed by colon and other non-space characters)
the value of a mandatory field (either citing_id or cited_id) is an empty string
the date is badly formatted (does not match the one regex that defines any correct possibility)
